Class StaffChiefController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jacktheclipper.frontend.controller.StaffChiefController

 @RequestMapping(value="/{organization}")

                                       java.util.List<OrganizationalUnit> units)

        Parameters:
        unitId - The id of the organization
        units - The list of organizations
        Returns:

      • showManageableUsers

        @GetMapping(value="/users")
public java.lang.String showManageableUsers(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                         org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth,
                                                                         @RequestParam(value="userId",required=false)
                                                                         java.util.UUID toEdit)
        Shows a html page to a UserRole.StaffChief where he can manage his users
        Parameters:
        model -
        auth -
        toEdit - The id of the User the UserRole.StaffChief wants to edit. The parameter is optional. If null is passed it defaults to the id of the first found user
        Returns:
        The page where a UserRole.StaffChief can manage his users

      • updateUser

        @PostMapping(value="/users/update")
public java.lang.String updateUser(@ModelAttribute(value="currentUser")
                                                                        ExtendedUser user,
                                                                        org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes,
                                                                        org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth,
                                                                        @PathVariable(value="organization")
                                                                        java.lang.String organization,
                                                                        @RequestParam(value="promote",required=false)
                                                                        java.lang.Boolean promote,
                                                                        @RequestParam(value="selectedUnits")
                                                                        java.util.List<java.util.UUID> units)
        Updates a user and redirects to "/{organization}/users"
        Parameters:
        user - The updated version of the user. Not every field of the user is populated correctly though
        redirectAttributes -
        auth -
        organization -
        promote - Whether the given user should be promoted to UserRole.StaffChief. If null he is instead demoted to UserRole.User. Due to the nature of Html-Checkboxes this value can only be null or True.
        units - A list of UUIDs that the user should belong to. Mirroring the ExtendedUser.units field but with less data.
        Returns:
        The page where a UserRole.StaffChief can manage his users

                                                                        @RequestParam(value="toDelete")

public java.lang.String addUser(@ModelAttribute(value="newUser")
                                                                  User user,
                                                                  @RequestParam(value="units")
                                                                  java.util.List<java.util.UUID> units,
                                                                  org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth,
                                                                  @RequestParam(value="newPromoted",required=false)

                                                                  org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes attributes,
                                                                  @PathVariable(value="organization")
                                                                  java.lang.String organization)

      • searchUser

        @PostMapping(value="/users/search")
public java.lang.String searchUser(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth,
                                                                        @RequestParam(value="name")
                                                                        java.lang.String toSearch,
                                                                        org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes attributes)
        Used to search for a user
        Parameters:
        auth -
        toSearch - The name or mail of the user to search
        attributes -
        Returns:
        The page where a UserRole.StaffChief can manage his users. If a user was found he is the one selected to edit. Otherwise the default behaviour of showManageableUsers(Model, Authentication, UUID) applies
